subject: order #SSN5728
description_text:
Hi



                                I’ve received my QRs but it looks like one
of them wasn’t machined correctly.



                                As you can see from the pictures, one of
them doesn’t have threads in all of the holes so doesn’t fit on one of my
wheels.



                                Would you be able to arrange a replacement
and if you require me to return the faulty one can you please send a
pre-paid label.



Thanks



Mark

conversations.body_text: Hi     Can I please have an update on this ASAP as I'm waiting to install my 3rd wheel.     Thanks     Mark
Hi any chance of a response to this please?
Hi Mark Rivers,    We apologize for the delayed response. We have arranged for a replacement shipment to be sent to you. Here is your tracking link:    https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047246176622
Hi, thank you for the response. How do I go about returning the faulty item? Thanks Mark
Hi Mark Rivers,    No need to return it,  Have fun!
